verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya kahe ei madhura vacana
caitanyera sṛṣṭi-ei prema-saṅkīrtana

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kahe—replied; ei—this; madhura vacana—transcendental sweetness of the voice; caitanyera sṛṣṭi—the creation of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ei—this; prema-saṅkīrtana—chanting in the ecstasy of love of Godhead.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya replied, "This sweet transcendental sound is a special creation of the Lord known as prema-saṅkīrtana, congregational chanting in love of Godhead.
